product_name: Kinetic Magnetic 3.0 Bike Trainer with Remote
long_description: A magnet-based trainer for serious cyclists, the Kinetic Magnetic 3.0 Bike Trainer features nine levels of adjustable resistance controlled via a remote shifter to get the most out of your training. Remote shifter can be clamped on your handlebar, allowing for fast and easy resistance adjustments. Magnetic resistance unit is very quiet so you won't wake the neighbors with that early-morning or late-night workout. 6.25 lb. flywheel is designed to deliver a smooth ride and a realistic, roadlike feel; tire roller is extra large to lessen tire wear. Trapezoidal welded frame with rubberized grippy knobs provides maximum stability and holds your bike level; folds flat for easy transport and storage. Well-suited for mountain, cyclocross, BMX, single-speed and other bikes with lower gearing. Compatible with all bikes with 22 - 29 in. diameter wheels and up to 29 x 2.4 in. tires. Comes fully assembled.
